text: The N700 series (N700系, Enu nanahyaku-kei) is a Japanese Shinkansen high-speed train with tilting capability developed jointly by JR Central and JR West for use on the Tokaido and San'yō Shinkansen lines since 2007, and also operated by JR Kyushu on the Kyushu Shinkansen line. ==Formation (N700A)== ==Gallery== File:Shinkansen N700 z15.jpg|N700 File:N700-1000 G15 20151212.jpg|N700A File:JRW N700-7000series S1.jpg|N700-7000 File:N700-8000 R2 20151026.jpg|N700-8000 File:Shinkansen N700Supreme Musashi-Kosugi Station.jpg|N700S File:Shinkansen N700 series Standard-sized car seat.JPG|Interior Category:Shinkansen
title: N700 Series Shinkansen
